modName: Dark Brotherhood Cowl Without Mask Workbench Recipe
summary: By default there is no way to improve the Dark Brotherhood Maskless Cowl (or Cowl Without Mask) on the workbench, the recipes were forgotten. So if you wanted to play a non beast race but still have your face showing, well, forget about improving the maskless cowl. But, no more! This small patch mod adds that recipe back into the game.
descriptionHtml: By default there is no way to improve the Dark Brotherhood Maskless Cowl (or Cowl Without Mask) on the workbench, the recipe was forgotten. So if you wanted to play a non beast race but still have your face showing, well, forget about improving the maskless cowl. But, no more! This small patch mod adds that recipe back into the game. Simple to use, download, install, and enable it. :D
author: llloyd

files.name: Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Cowl WithOut Mask Fix
files.fileName: Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Cowl WithOut Mask Fix-90366-1-0.rar
